overview.heading: Commercial Manager
overview.information: In this module you find all the Commercial Plans for your Regions. You can upload new ones or dive deeper into existing ones.

fileInput.dropFilesLabel: Drag and Drop your File for here
fileInput.rejectedFilesErrorMessage: This file type is not supported. Please select files of the following types: {acceptedFiles}

modal.heading: Confirmation
modal.description: You can publish the plan now directly to Airline and our Customers or do it any time later by coming back to this and use the publish plan button.
modal.note: Once Published, it cannot be changed again.
modal.question: Do you want to Proceed?

success.description: You have successfully published the commercial plan to customer & airline

error.description: Can not publish the commercial plan to customer & airline at the moment

errorMessages.lineSize: Invalid file format encountered. Line length required is 200.
errorMessages.invalidFlightNumberFormat: Flight number {value} format is not valid, should be in format of ex. XZ0000
errorMessages.departureoffsetDateTimeFormat: Invalid departure date/time field ({value}) inserted, please check.
errorMessages.arrivaloffsetDateTimeFormat: Invalid arrival date/time field ({value}) inserted, please check.
errorMessages.duplicateCommercialPlanName: This name already exists, try another schedule plan name
errorMessages.flightNumberDuplicate: Flight number is not unique per day, {value} is used in schedule plan {plan}
errorMessages.connectionNotFound: Connection ({value}) is no longer valid, please check
errorMessages.connectionInconsistentDepArvTime: Connection ({name}) is no longer valid for the planned schedule, please check
errorMessages.multipleRegionVertiports: All vertiports should be in the same region
errorMessages.unspecifiedVertiportRegion: Connection ({connection}) has unspecified region for the vertiport ({vertiport}), please check
errorMessages.inconsistentDepArrValidFrom: Connection ({connection}) starting date is not consistent with vertiport ({vertiport})
errorMessages.inconsistentDepArrValidTo: Connection ({connection}) end date is not consistent with vertiport ({vertiport})
errorMessages.departureVertiportNoPassengerService: Vertiport ({id}) has an empty 'services' field, please check
errorMessages.arrivalVertiportNoPassengerService: Vertiport ({id}) has an empty 'services' field, please check
